SJS/十的新型分类系统旨在改善患者护理SJS和10在1922年首次被史蒂文斯（Stevens）和约翰逊（Johnson）确定，现在被认为是严重程度连续的疾病，从温和形式（SJS）到最严重（十）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/novel-classification-system-for-sjsten-aims-to-improve-patient-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/novel-classification-system-for-sjsten-aims-to-improve-patient-care-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ddB2C86-9ACB-473D-B6A9-35A17560D630 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 13:02:13 -0500 Novel classification system for SJS/TEN aims to improve patient care

与人类和小鼠的精神分裂症有关的基因突变伊利诺伊州乌尔巴纳大学 - 千卫大学的研究人员报告说，在两名精神分裂症患者中发现的一种遗传突变也增加了具有相同突变的小鼠的精神分裂症相关行为，这是与精神病的直接遗传联系的罕见发现。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/genetic-moart-link--schizizophrenia-in-both-humans-humans-humans-and-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/genetic-moart-link--schizizophrenia-in-both-humans-humans-humans-and-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80BA5B19-B8D1-495A-8470-F9DDCDC48C41 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 12:50:21 -0500 Genetic mutation linked to schizophrenia in both humans and mice

新艾滋病毒疗法Lenacapavir在乌干达人群中表现出很高的功效威尔·康奈尔医学公司（Weill Cornell Medicine）领导的一项跨国，多机构研究的研究发现，在乌干达的一批患者中，对新的HIV疗法的自然抗药性几乎没有抗性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/new-hiv-therapy-lenacapavir-shows-shows-high-felficacy-in-formefficacy-in-ugandan-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/new-hiv-therapy-lenacapavir-shows-shows-high-efficacy-in-felficacy-in-efficacy-in-ugandan-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e8de4b-9fc4-4592-A45B-2531A0F17C33 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 12:16:26 -0500 New HIV therapy lenacapavir shows high efficacy in Ugandan population
纳米技术为治疗被忽视的热带疾病提供了新的希望在热带和亚热带地区，被忽视的热带疾病（NTDS）仍然具有重大的健康负担，治疗方案和诊断能力有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/nanotechnology-offers-new-hope-for-treating-neweating-neycleting-neycleted-tropical-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/nanotechnology-offers-new-hope-for-treating-neating-necleting-neclected-tropical-tropical-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B5A9AC4-23D3-4801-9E11-48DAA4A7FD54 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 12:09:07 -0500 Nanotechnology offers new hope for treating Neglected Tropical Diseases

姜的呋喃酮化合物可能会为炎症性肠病提供新的治疗方法由多伦多大学研究人员领导的一支国际团队在Ginger中发现了一种称为Furanodienone（FDN）的化合物，该化合物有选择地结合并调节涉及炎症性肠病（IBD）的核受体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/gingers-furanodienone-compound-may-may-may-ferfer-new-warteatment-for- informinfor-inframmatoration-bowel-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/Gingers-furanodienone-compound-may-may-may-ferfer-new-warteatment-for- informinfor-inframmatoration-bowel-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Ad8d9ff0-a4e4-4716-4716-afb0-9a062b7d0375 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 11:48:34 -0500 Ginger's furanodienone compound may offer new treatment for inflammatory bowel disease
坦佩雷大学（Tampere University）获得表皮溶解药物的许可证给Theravia坦佩雷大学（Tampere University）已获得了一种药物分子许可，该药物分子旨在治疗一群稀有和严重的皮肤疾病的表皮分子溶液（EB），这是一家总部位于法国巴黎地区的制药公司Theravia。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/tampere-university-licenses-licenses-drug-for-epidermyssy--bullosasa-to-theravia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/tampere-university-licenses-licenses-drug-for-epidermossed-bullosa-bullosa-theravia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49EA7D79-4734-4734-40F2-AAAAC-0D1E88C7BD37 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 11:20:56 -0500 Tampere University licenses drug for Epidermolysis Bullosa to Theravia
